name: AtlanInfection
description:
Special thanks to little art for the posters. Special thanks to the first donor of the project, thanks to their support it is possible to continue working and improving forever give the best

The main objective is to survive.

In the game you can explore and investigate, you have several enemies that will try to kill you, they will give you meat that will help you get almost all of the weapons accessories. You will also find the food and resources you need to live in a world reduced to rubble. The game is 100% free to play (I accept donations) and is constantly updated.

You can also follow us on several platforms.

Web page

Facebook

YouTube

Update 0.1.0

The update incorporated the following:

*character customization

*texture arrangement

Special thanks to little art for the posters.

Little artist
